dcterms:description: The StarCraft II Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) provides a collection of reinforcement learning benchmarks designed specifically for multi-agent environments, focusing on micromanagement tasks.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: The Traffic Junction environment is a multi-agent setting where cars must navigate through junctions while avoiding collisions, with varying difficulty levels.

dcterms:description: The Predator-Prey environment consists of a grid world where predators must coordinate to capture prey, requiring teamwork and strategy.
